booking.cancellationPolicy: Bookings can be cancelled 24 hours prior.

responseChannels.description: Contact the building helpdesk for immediate assistance.
Contact security for access issues or emergencies.

metadata.summary: Dr Jai Singh (cardiology) consults in Room 418 on Floor 4 of the Academic Building at AIIMS Jammu. The room is wheelchair accessible and available for outpatient services during OPD hours.
